name: save-ismael
description: A Stranger Things-inspired FPS across Upside-Down Dubai - Save Mammoo Ismael

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules

author: Mammoo Ismael
